title: The Search For Jesus: A Christmas Message
description: Down through the generations of time, the message from Jesus has been the same. But how do we follow him if we don't find him? And how shall we find him it first we don't seek him? Where and how should we begin this search for Jesus? Before we can successfully under5take a personal search for Jesus, we must first prepare for him in our lives and room for him in our heart. How do we prepare?
author: Thomas S. Monson
